TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
> 
> But... But... But that\'d make us lose our nations ...

And some of us spent MINUTES on our pages!

/humor

(Seriously am hoping for the upload to work, though.)
So, has 'soon' come closer?

> 
> So, has 'soon' come closer?

Probably not; Radion hasn\'t been online since last night.

> 
> Probably not; Radion hasn\'t been online since last night.

Most likely indicates that he is working on it.

> 
> Most likely indicates that he is working on it.

Or he\'s asleep.
I\'ve decided to scrap the old one, and start again, again. Oh boy, here I go again.
How much have you managed to save?

> 
> How much have you managed to save?

I have a few maps, some texts, and a general layout saved on my hard drive. However, I do have a new idea for the forum.

I was thinking of a 'Citizen\'s Locale' for those who don\'t want to run nations or corporations, but would rather roleplay **as** the citizens of the nation/workers in the corporation. It\'d definitely add a new zone to look at.

> 
> I was thinking of a 'Citizen\'s Locale' for those who don\'t want to run nations or corporations, but would rather roleplay **as** the citizens of the nation/workers in the corporation. It\'d definitely add a new zone to look at.

Could be very interesting; especially with space programs, we could do proper astronaut/cosmomaut/yuhangyuan/whatever selection. 

Do you plan to keep the current nations, or start all that again as well?

> 
> Could be very interesting; especially with space programs, we could do proper astronaut/cosmomaut/yuhangyauan/whatever selection. 
> 
> Do you plan to keep the current nations, or start all that again as well?

1. 'Yuhangyauan'. 

2. If we restart, as I have been trying to do allready, I want to be one of Radion\'s neighbors. I hope his genius will wear off on us. One can only hope.
The official map will be saved and used.

> 
> 1. 'Yuhangyuan'.

It\'s the official name for Chinese space travellers. Better than the Indians, they want to call theirs \'Gaganauts\'.

> 
> The official map will be saved and used.

Does this mean people who\'ve already applied and been accepted will keep their nations?
I hope so, don\'t want to redo mine again and maybe get beat to my land again...
Oh, Radion, do you have the text out of the nation pages? It\'d be a pain to rewrite it all.

What I know - 

Everything from the previous forum is currently stored in one file that I have saved, including posts, threads, etc.

I cannot upload it all.

If I can locate specific threads, it might be possible to give the text back to those who it belongs to.

Member lists might still be store there, so you shouldn\'t have to take the test again.

Basically, It\'ll take a while, but things can be restored.
Radion can you possibly send it to me? I can possibly break it down into segments, and send it to you if needed.

if you are restarting mady try a new site?

i sugest Xenforo

> 
> if you are restarting mady try a new site?

We\'ve got a new site, which you\'d know if you\'d actually bothered to read the thread. We simply can\'t upload all of the info from the old site onto it.
Erm, if we can make requests, then the only thread I\'d miss would be my nation page. Could I have it saved and uploaded if possible?

> 
> Erm, if we can make requests, then the only thread I\'d miss would be my nation page. Could I have it saved and uploaded if possible?

Same here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Oh, so the existence of our nations will be preserved.

Oh good!
Could i possibly have a copy of the test?
I kinda want my nation page back as well. Please?

Radion, you might just want to post that backup file on Mediafire and let people download it to extract whatever they want.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
